level.heading: Waiver and compromise; authority of the Chief Financial Officer.

level.text: Waive, in whole or in part, interest assessed pursuant to this subchapter in the interest of equity or in the public interest; or

Compromise any charge or vault rent assessed pursuant to this subchapter when, in the Chief Financial Officer’s judgment, there is reasonable doubt as to the liability of the owner against whom the vault rent was assessed or the collectability of the tax.
